Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.alert

Interface AlertService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlertServiceImpl
public interface AlertService
Provides service-level methods for retrieving and checking the visibility of alert components, either by a user-specified type or a default configuration.

Each method resolves the appropriate AlertComponentType‚Äîfor instance, corresponding to a particular UI framework‚Äîand delegates to the correct Alert implementation under the hood.

The default alert type can be overridden by specifying an AlertComponentType parameter, allowing different UI implementations (e.g., Bootstrap, Material Design, etc.).

Author:
Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª

  • Method Details

    • getValue

      default String getValue(SmartWebElement container)
      Retrieves the value of an alert within the specified container, using the default alert component type.
      Parameters:
      container - The SmartWebElement container that contains the alert.
      Returns:
      The value of the alert as a String.

    • getValue

      String getValue(AlertComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container)
      Retrieves the value of an alert within the specified container, using the given alert component type.
      Parameters:
      componentType - The specific alert component type.
      container - The SmartWebElement container that contains the alert.
      Returns:
      The value of the alert as a String.

    • getValue

      default String getValue(org.openqa.selenium.By containerLocator)
      Retrieves the value of an alert located by the specified locator, using the default alert component type.
      Parameters:
      containerLocator - The locator for the container that contains the alert.
      Returns:
      The value of the alert as a String.

    • isVisible

      default boolean isVisible(SmartWebElement container)
      Checks if an alert within the specified container is visible, using the default alert component type.
      Parameters:
      container - The SmartWebElement container that contains the alert.
      Returns:
      true if the alert is visible, false otherwise.

    • isVisible

      boolean isVisible(AlertComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container)
      Checks if an alert within the specified container is visible, using the given alert component type.

      container - The SmartWebElement container that contains the alert.
      Returns:
